lessons.title: Styling with CSS
lessons.taskDescription: Style a small card component: add a box shadow, padding and a hover effect.
lessons.html:
Card title

This is a small card. Hover to see the effect.
lessons.css:
.card { max-width: 320px; padding: 16px; border-radius: 6px; box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.08); background: #fff; transition: transform .15s ease, box-shadow .15s ease; }
.card:hover { transform: translateY(-4px); box-shadow: 0 8px 18px rgba(0,0,0,0.12); }
lessons.javascript:
// No JS required for this assignment
console.log('Card assignment ready');

lessons.title: Interactive JavaScript
lessons.taskDescription: Create a button that increments a counter displayed on the page.
lessons.css:
#counterApp { font-family: Tahoma, sans-serif; margin: 12px; }
#incBtn { padding: 8px 12px; border-radius: 4px; border: 1px solid #888; background: #f5f5f5; cursor: pointer; }
lessons.javascript: (function(){ var countEl = document.getElementById('count'); var btn = document.getElementById('incBtn'); var count = 0; btn && btn.addEventListener('click', function(){ count++; if(countEl) countEl.textContent = count; }); })();
